Title: RaSOSS - Remote analysis System for Open Source Software
Published: International Conference on Software Engineering Advances
Elements_risk_assessment: The veracity of the defect induced changes
UseOF-SZZ: To classify to defect induced and non-defect induce
Summary:
It presents a system, Remote Analysis System Open Source Software (RaSOSS), for analyzing 
    maintenance process through both systems.
Outcome:
using data from DMS and VMS it is possible to analyze OSS maintenance processes. 
    System has been very informative when evaluating OSS maintenance process.
